"Yes I agree. I believe we may be able to reach an agreement with them. If we 
say were no longer the two evils we once were we might be able to hold off a 
maximal attack for a little while longer. Enough to rid us of Cyngar."

--part1_1ab.8efe1f8.2ac0b88f_boundary
